indicator_name: 지난 12개월 동안 신체적 혹은 성적 괴롭힘을 당한 인구 비율(성, 연령, 장애 및 발생장소별)
target_name: 2030년까지 포괄적이고 안전하며 보편적으로 접근 가능한 녹색 및 공공장소 제공 (특히, 여성, 아동, 노인, 장애인)

en.title: Proportion of persons victim of physical or sexual harassment, by sex, age, disability status and place of occurrence, in the previous 12 months
en.target: By 2030, provide universal access to safe, inclusive and accessible, green and public spaces, in particular for women and children, older persons and persons with disabilities
en.indicator_name: Proportion of persons victim of physical or sexual harassment, by sex, age, disability status and place of occurrence, in the previous 12 months
en.indicator_definition: Proportion of persons victim of physical or sexual harassment, by sex, age, disability status and place of occurrence, in the previous 12 months
en.computation_numerator: Number of adults aged 16-59 in England and Wales who experienced incidents of indecent exposure or unwanted sexual touching in the previous twelve months * 100
en.computation_denominator: Number of adults aged 16-59 in England and Wales
en.computation_disaggregation: This can be disaggregated by sex (male and female). Sexual assault category (by partner, by family member). This disaggregation can be further disaggregated amongst each other (e.g. sexual assault category by sex).
en.un_custodian_agency: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
en.goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 4.0 MB)
en.source_url_text_1: Appendix Tables - focus on violent crime and sexual offences
en.page_content: ▶ Data type: Alternative national data (Type3) This is national statistics used as an alternative even not exactly corresponding to UN SDGs indicators. When no statistics corresponding to Type1 and 2, it can be selected through consultation with the concerned agencies.
